reviewText: As a person who has experienced and am in thrawl of the very ancient and refined  Chinese Opera genra, I especially liked  appreciated the historical information with snippets of performances.  It was a very enriching experience for me.  It is very difficult to obtain DVDs of these gems due to the fact that there are so few of "Us" to create a demand.

When I purchased this video I was under the impression I was purchasing an opera as I'm expanding my knowledge of the arts and the classics. This is not an opera but rather a travelogue. Narrator speaks in Chinese and you must read subtitles.
